mutants.code:
def calculate_max_points(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, M, K, A, B, C) = case
        s = 1
        g = [0] * N
        for v in range(N):
            p = B[v][A[v] - 1]
            s += p
            x = 0
            for u in range(M):
                e = B[v][u] - C[v][u] - p
                x = max(x, e)
            g[v] = x
        g.sort(reverse=True)
        results.append(s + sum(g[:K]))
    return results

    results = []

        (N, M, K, A, B, C) = case

            s += p
            x = 0
            for u in range(M):
                e = B[v][u] - C[v][u] - p
                x = max(x, e)
            g[v] = x
        g.sort(reverse=True)
        results.append(s + sum(g[:K]))
    return results

    results = []

            g[v] = x

def calculate_max_points(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, M, K, A, B, C) = case
        s = 0
        g = [0] * N
        for v in range(N):
            p = B[v][A[v] - 1]
            s += p
            x = 0
            for u in range(M):
                e = B[v][u] * C[v][u] - p
                x = max(x, e)
            g[v] = x
        g.sort(reverse=True)
        results.append(s + sum(g[:K]))
    return results
